text: Claude Antoine, comte Prieur-Duvernois (1763–1832), commonly known as Prieur de la Côte-d'Or after his native département, was a French engineer and a politician during and after the French Revolution. Category:1763 births Category:1832 deaths Category:Presidents of the National Convention Category:People from Côte-d'Or
title: Claude Antoine, comte Prieur-Duvernois
